title: 2  Quiz: Discipleship Basics
text:
2.0.1 Question 1
What does “disciple” mean?
Reveal Answer


  Correct answer: A follower of Jesus (Matthew 28:19)





A student
A follower of Jesus
A religious leader




2.0.2 Question 2
“Faith without works is dead” is from:

Matthew 5
James 2
John 3

Reveal Answer


  Correct answer: James 2

title: 3  Discussion Questions
text:
3.0.1 Core Question
What does this passage reveal about God’s character?
(Leader’s guide: Focus on verses 5-8)


3.0.2 Personal Reflection

How does this challenge your current perspective?
When have you experienced this truth in your life?



3.0.3 Group Activity
Breakout Groups (10 mins):
1. Share one practical application
2. Pray for each other’s struggles
